name: Titty World
summary:
A free "practice game" with characters from the webcomics "IT HURTS!!" and "PLEASE FORGIVE ME!!!"
Katie and Pasqualo have been sucked into a fantasy RPG. The goal of the game is: LOOK AT TITTIES?! Say WHAT?! Join the two girls (and maybe someone else too) as they reluctantly go through this game and try to get out! Believe it or not, despite the title, this isn't a pervy game. No actual boobs.
